name: Gangsta Mario the Game
description:
Play as gangsta Mario and defeat all the gangsta enemies!

Currently a demo and might end up being a forever demo, so keep that in mind. So far there are four stages, 3 bosses, and a unlockable hard mode that features stronger bosses and enemies! 

Discord link

Controls:

W,A,S,D: move

Mouse: aim

Left Click: shoot
